product_overview: The Repair Service Admin Panel is a comprehensive web-based management system built using Laravel, PHP, and Tailwind CSS. It provides secure multi-user authentication, complete management of customers, technicians, services, bookings, and components, along with analytics and settings management through an intuitive responsive UI with dark mode support.
core_goals: Enable secure and reliable admin authentication with OTP verification.
Provide comprehensive management of customers, technicians, services, bookings, and components.
Facilitate detailed analytics and reporting to assist business decisions.
Offer separate portals for customers and technicians for streamlined interactions.
Support responsive design with modern UI/UX standards including dark mode.
Ensure accessibility compliance and high performance throughout the application.
key_features: Admin authentication system with OTP verification ensuring high security.
Multi-user authentication systems separating admin, technician, and customer access.
Admin dashboard with key statistics, quick actions, and charts for analytics.
Customer management including CRUD operations and status tracking.
Technician profile management with approval workflows and skill tracking.
Complete booking management supporting status tracking and updates.
Service and service category management with flexible CRUD operations.
Component inventory management system to handle repair components.
Notification management for users to receive timely updates.
Comprehensive system settings interface with multiple configuration options.
Public service catalog and information display for end-user transparency.
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS supporting dark mode and accessibility standards.
Data visualization using Chart.js for metrics and reports.
Robust database schema with migrations and seeders for data management.
user_flow_summary: Admin logs in through a secure OTP-based authentication system.
Upon successful login, admin accesses the dashboard presenting key metrics and quick management actions.
Admin manages customers, technicians, and services through dedicated management pages with search, filter, and CRUD capabilities.
Admin reviews and processes bookings including assignment, status updates, and timeline tracking.
Customers access their portal to manage bookings and view available services.
Technicians manage their work and bookings through the technician portal with status updates.
Users receive notifications related to bookings and system updates.
Admin accesses the reports section for business insights via interactive charts and data visualizations.
Admin configures system preferences and settings through the settings management interface.
All users enjoy a consistent UI with responsive design and optional dark mode for accessibility.
validation_criteria: Successful OTP verification for admin login.
CRUD operations function correctly for customers, technicians, services, bookings, and components.
Dashboard displays accurate and real-time statistics and charts.
Booking status updates reflect correctly across admin, customer, and technician portals.
Notifications are delivered and displayed appropriately to users.
Responsive UI renders correctly across supported browsers and devices.
Dark mode toggle functions properly and persists user preference.
Accessibility standards including WCAG 2.1 AA are met with proper ARIA roles and keyboard navigation.
Reports generate accurate data visualizations and support export capabilities.
System settings persist changes correctly and apply configurations without errors.
Proper error handling and user feedback implemented for all interactive actions.
